PRE, CODE and essentially every element having the contentEditable="true" attribute is made 100% well.. editable,
which is very useful if you want to have "textarea like" qualities such as pressing [CTRL]+[A] to select all of the code in those elements (mostly for copy&paste).

But, since this is not the default behaviour, there is a need to inform your users of the UI quality, usually in this case you can use the title attribute (but it requires setting text for each element), in this case a CSS only solution, either TEXT or an IMAGE will work wonderfully with our requirements.

<img src="https://icompile.eladkarako.com/_uploads/2016/09/icompile.eladkarako.com_inform_your_users_of_ctrl_a_option_in_contenteditable_true_containers.png" alt="icompile-eladkarako-com_inform_your_users_of_ctrl_a_option_in_contenteditable_true_containers-png" width="546" height="425" />
<!--more-->


Here is the CSS code including the image

<pre><span style='color:#696969; '>/*have a tooltip saying "[CTRL]+[A] friendly"*/</span>
<span style='color:#808030; '>[</span><span style='color:#074726; '>contentEditable</span><span style='color:#808030; '>=</span><span style='color:#800000; '>"</span><span style='color:#0000e6; '>true</span><span style='color:#800000; '>"</span><span style='color:#808030; '>]</span><span style='color:#800080; '>:</span><span style='color:#800000; font-weight:bold; '>hover</span><span style='color:#800080; '>:</span><span style='color:#800000; font-weight:bold; '>before</span> <span style='color:#800080; '>{</span>
  <span style='color:#bb7977; font-weight:bold; '>content</span><span style='color:#808030; '>:</span>  <span style='color:#400000; '>url</span><span style='color:#808030; '>(</span><span style='color:#0000e6; '>"</span><span style='color:#666616; '>data</span><span style='color:#800080; '>:</span><span style='color:#40015a; '>image/png;base64,</span><span style='color:#0000e6; '>"</span><span style='color:#808030; '>)</span><span style='color:#800080; '>;</span>
  <span style='color:#bb7977; font-weight:bold; '>width</span><span style='color:#808030; '>:</span>    <span style='color:#008c00; '>97</span><span style='color:#006600; '>px</span><span style='color:#800080; '>;</span>
  <span style='color:#bb7977; font-weight:bold; '>height</span><span style='color:#808030; '>:</span>   <span style='color:#008c00; '>64</span><span style='color:#006600; '>px</span><span style='color:#800080; '>;</span>
  
  <span style='color:#bb7977; font-weight:bold; '>top</span><span style='color:#808030; '>:</span>      <span style='color:#008c00; '>80</span><span style='color:#006600; '>px</span><span style='color:#800080; '>;</span>
  <span style='color:#bb7977; font-weight:bold; '>right</span><span style='color:#808030; '>:</span>    <span style='color:#008c00; '>5</span><span style='color:#006600; '>px</span><span style='color:#800080; '>;</span>

  <span style='color:#bb7977; font-weight:bold; '>display</span><span style='color:#808030; '>:</span>  <span style='color:#074726; '>block</span><span style='color:#800080; '>;</span>
  <span style='color:#bb7977; font-weight:bold; '>position</span><span style='color:#808030; '>:</span> <span style='color:#074726; '>absolute</span><span style='color:#800080; '>;</span>
  <span style='color:#bb7977; font-weight:bold; '>opacity</span><span style='color:#808030; '>:</span>  <span style='color:#008c00; '>.7</span><span style='color:#800080; '>;</span>
<span style='color:#800080; '>}</span>
</pre>

<blockquote>here is the <a download="icompile.eladkarako.com_inform_your_users_of_ctrl_a_option_in_contenteditable_true_containers.pdn" href="https://icompile.eladkarako.com/_uploads/2016/09/icompile.eladkarako.com_inform_your_users_of_ctrl_a_option_in_contenteditable_true_containers.pdn" type="application/octet-stream" target="_blank">raw Paint.NET image</a> (with saperate layers, you can edit).</blockquote>

<blockquote>here is the PNG I'm using in this version: <a type="application/octet-stream" target="_blank"  download="icompile.eladkarako.com_inform_your_users_of_ctrl_a_option_in_contenteditable_true_containers_png_32bit.png" href="https://icompile.eladkarako.com/_uploads/2016/09/icompile.eladkarako.com_inform_your_users_of_ctrl_a_option_in_contenteditable_true_containers_png_32bit.png"><img src="https://icompile.eladkarako.com/_uploads/2016/09/icompile.eladkarako.com_inform_your_users_of_ctrl_a_option_in_contenteditable_true_containers_png_32bit.png" alt="icompile-eladkarako-com_inform_your_users_of_ctrl_a_option_in_contenteditable_true_containers_png_32bit-png" width="97" height="64"  /> (Click To Download)</a>
</blockquote>

*and of course - you can just use a plain-text instead of an image.

*also- you can add <code>pointer-events:none</code> (and also <code>touch-action:none</code>) to prevent from the focus to switch to the toolkit image (focus-stealing), this way any click "inside the image" will simply have the focus stay in the host container under same z-index (meaning the one having the contentEditable attribute),
<strong>this is a very simple, yet efficient and high-performance non-javascript solution :)</strong>

<pre><span style='color:#696969; '>/*have a tooltip saying "[CTRL]+[A] friendly" on all containers with contentEditable="true" attribute*/</span>
<span style='color:#808030; '>[</span><span style='color:#074726; '>contentEditable</span><span style='color:#808030; '>=</span><span style='color:#800000; '>"</span><span style='color:#0000e6; '>true</span><span style='color:#800000; '>"</span><span style='color:#808030; '>]</span><span style='color:#800080; '>:</span><span style='color:#800000; font-weight:bold; '>hover</span><span style='color:#800080; '>:</span><span style='color:#800000; font-weight:bold; '>before</span> <span style='color:#800080; '>{</span>
  <span style='color:#bb7977; font-weight:bold; '>content</span><span style='color:#808030; '>:</span>         <span style='color:#400000; '>url</span><span style='color:#808030; '>(</span><span style='color:#0000e6; '>"</span><span style='color:#666616; '>data</span><span style='color:#800080; '>:</span><span style='color:#40015a; '>image/png;base64,</span><span style='color:#0000e6; '>"</span><span style='color:#808030; '>)</span><span style='color:#800080; '>;</span>
  <span style='color:#bb7977; font-weight:bold; '>width</span><span style='color:#808030; '>:</span>           <span style='color:#008c00; '>97</span><span style='color:#006600; '>px</span><span style='color:#800080; '>;</span>
  <span style='color:#bb7977; font-weight:bold; '>height</span><span style='color:#808030; '>:</span>          <span style='color:#008c00; '>64</span><span style='color:#006600; '>px</span><span style='color:#800080; '>;</span>

  <span style='color:#bb7977; font-weight:bold; '>position</span><span style='color:#808030; '>:</span>        <span style='color:#074726; '>absolute</span><span style='color:#800080; '>;</span>
  <span style='color:#bb7977; font-weight:bold; '>display</span><span style='color:#808030; '>:</span>         <span style='color:#074726; '>block</span><span style='color:#800080; '>;</span>
  <span style='color:#bb7977; font-weight:bold; '>opacity</span><span style='color:#808030; '>:</span>         <span style='color:#008c00; '>.7</span><span style='color:#800080; '>;</span>

  <span style='color:#bb7977; font-weight:bold; '>top</span><span style='color:#808030; '>:</span>             <span style='color:#008c00; '>80</span><span style='color:#006600; '>px</span><span style='color:#800080; '>;</span>
  <span style='color:#bb7977; font-weight:bold; '>right</span><span style='color:#808030; '>:</span>           <span style='color:#008c00; '>5</span><span style='color:#006600; '>px</span><span style='color:#800080; '>;</span>

  <span style='color:#696969; '>/*prevent focus-stealing*/</span>
  <span style='color:#bb7977; font-weight:bold; '>pointer-events</span><span style='color:#808030; '>:</span>  <span style='color:#074726; '>none</span><span style='color:#800080; '>;</span>
  touch-action<span style='color:#808030; '>:</span>    <span style='color:#074726; '>none</span><span style='color:#800080; '>;</span>
<span style='color:#800080; '>}</span>
</pre>

note you can mark-out the top definition, in-case you'll find it <em>buggy</em> or something..

<hr/>

<blockquote>Saving some bytes by using a lower-color setting GIF image,
in this version I use a 4-colors palette GIF, also it is interlaced (showing lower quality faster and improve as file loads), it still looks ok'ish: <a type="application/octet-stream" target="_blank"  download="icompile.eladkarako.com_inform_your_users_of_ctrl_a_option_in_contenteditable_true_containers_gif_4colors_interlaced.gif" href="https://icompile.eladkarako.com/_uploads/2016/09/icompile.eladkarako.com_inform_your_users_of_ctrl_a_option_in_contenteditable_true_containers_gif_4colors_interlaced.gif"><img src="https://icompile.eladkarako.com/_uploads/2016/09/icompile.eladkarako.com_inform_your_users_of_ctrl_a_option_in_contenteditable_true_containers_gif_4colors_interlaced.gif" alt="icompile-eladkarako-com_inform_your_users_of_ctrl_a_option_in_contenteditable_true_containers_gif_4colors_interlaced-gif" width="97" height="64" title="(Click To Download)"/> (Click To Download)</a>

to switch to this version use this value in the image, instead of the original one:
<pre>"data:image/gif;base64,"</pre></blockquote>

<blockquote>Save 12 to-16 bytes more, by <em>not using the <em>interlaced</em> quality</em> of the GIF
<a type="application/octet-stream" target="_blank" download="icompile.eladkarako.com_inform_your_users_of_ctrl_a_option_in_contenteditable_true_containers_gif_4colors_no_interlaced.gif" href="https://icompile.eladkarako.com/_uploads/2016/09/icompile.eladkarako.com_inform_your_users_of_ctrl_a_option_in_contenteditable_true_containers_gif_4colors_no_interlaced.gif"><img src="https://icompile.eladkarako.com/_uploads/2016/09/icompile.eladkarako.com_inform_your_users_of_ctrl_a_option_in_contenteditable_true_containers_gif_4colors_no_interlaced.gif" alt="icompile-eladkarako-com_inform_your_users_of_ctrl_a_option_in_contenteditable_true_containers_gif_4colors_no_interlaced-gif" width="97" height="64" title="(Click To Download)"/> (Click To Download)</a>

to use this version replace the current base64-image-text you are using with this one:
<pre>"data:image/gif;base64,"</pre>
</blockquote>
